pages.text: A useful enchant used to increase the size of your Buddycard Binders. Each level will add more card slots to the binder, the first one adding 18, the second adding 42, and the third adding 66.

pages.title: Enchant Levels
pages.text: Extra Page has 3 levels. For Extra Page I, you need a level 10 enchanting table, for Extra Page II, you will need a level 20 one, and for Extra Page III you will need a level 30, or maxed out, one.
